name: HaikuGranny
0:
”Alexa, Start Haiku Granny and give me a poem”
”Alexa, Tell Haiku Granny to give me wisdom”
”Alexa, Ask Haiku Granny to share a poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku granny
des: Haiku Granny is a cozy skill that brings you the warmth and wisdom of comforting haikus. A haiku is a traditional form of Japanese poetry, usually consisting of three lines with a 5-7-5 syllable structure. Simply ask for a haiku, and Haiku Granny will share short, reflective pieces inspired by the beauty of nature and the simple joys of life. Each haiku feels like an old tale, perfect for moments when you need a gentle reminder of life’s small wonders. Whether you’re looking for calm before bed, inspiration in the morning, or just a peaceful pause, Haiku Granny is here to add a touch of poetry to your day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
